item.title: Adding a floating TOC
item.description: I’m using a theme called ‘Ink-free’. Pretty awesome I would say. I will make it even more awesome by adding a floating Table of Contents (TOC). Look to the right. Do you see it? If you don’t then probably I messed up somewhere. Anyway, here’s the process. The default one By default you already have one. But it is a static TOC, which does not make any sense. Look into the /layouts/_default/_markup/single.
